sections.description:
A Wordpress plugin that connects to OpenAI to generate a meta description for your page.

Installation

  1. Download the Meta Description Boy plugin from the GitHub repository.
  2. Log in to your WordPress website.
  3. Go to the Plugins menu, then click Add New.
  4. Click Upload Plugin, and choose the plugin file you downloaded.
  5. Click Install Now and then Activate the plugin.

Updating Settings

  1. Go to the Settings menu, then click Meta Description Boy.
  2. Here you can:
    • Enter your OpenAI API Key.
    • Select the post types for which you want to generate meta descriptions.
    • Select the OpenAI model you want to use.
    • Update the prompt text if needed.
    • Select the user roles that can access the settings page and metabox.
  3. Click Save Changes to apply your updates.

Generating Meta Descriptions

  1. Go to the Posts or Pages section in your WordPress dashboard.
  2. Select the post or page you want to generate a meta description for.
  3. On the post/page editing screen, locate the Meta Description meta box, usually found on the right-hand side.
  4. Make sure there is some content in the post/page. The Generate Meta Description button will appear once there's content.
  5. Click the Generate Meta Description button. The plugin will generate a meta description based on the content and display it below the button.
  6. If you wish, click the Copy to Clipboard button to copy the generated meta description, and then paste it into the meta description field of your SEO plugin.
